node.display_long_description:
*包括免費的雙手、舊礦、亡靈谷和經典部落更新*

虚拟现实遇上僵尸横行的末日世界！亚利桑那阳光（Arizona Sunshine®）是专为虚拟现实（VR）打造的第一人称射击类（FPS）游戏，可带你沉浸于末日之后美国西南部地区僵尸横行的世界。

当你听到收音机中传来人声时，你的心中将涌起无限希望——在末日之后骄阳似火的大峡谷州，还有其他幸存者！你凭着仅有的几件动作控制类武器以及沿途搜寻到的稀缺武器和补给，突破一波又一波为吃你脑子而来的僵尸群的重重围困，找寻其他幸存者。

• 通过现实动作操控武器：使用VR动作控制器可以通过现实动作操控超过25种武器。玩家能够预计攻击、管理武器以及用准镜瞄准，将不死敌人炸成碎片。
• 情节完整的战役：内置VR块连在一起将构成一段完整的故事——你可以跳到某个短小的战斗情景，也可以按顺序完成所有战斗。
• 自由探索：可以自由移动来探索危机四伏的峡谷和深不见底黑暗矿场
• 多人联合作战：可以使用联合作战或僵尸暴动多人模式协同战斗（Oculus Quest上最多4位玩家）

nodes.title: Free Horde Mode map "Trailer Park" out now!
nodes.body_text:
The Trailer Park is here!

Set in one of the more advanced campaign environments of Arizona Sunshine, the Trailer Park map is an entirely new content update to the popular VR zombie shooters multiplayer horde mode, where up to 4 survivors team up in co-op to fend off wave after wave of hangry undead for as long as they can.

Good luck surviving in the scorched apocalypse.

nodes.title: Multiplayer Connectivity Issue resolved
nodes.body_text: We've just patched Arizona Sunshine to resolve the multiplayer connectivity issues that arose with the Quest 2 release. Rejecting Oculus' microphone usage previously could prevent players from joining each other in a multiplayer lobby. Please update Arizona Sunshine to the latest version to continue the zombie adventure with your friends!

node.reviewDescription:
I’ve seen some other reviews, and I thought that I should add a tips review for new guys, so here goes:

Tips

Doors—I’ve seen reviews that say that they are troublesome and annoying. Fortunately, I have a solution. If you hover your hand over the white circle on the handle and tap the grip button once and the door will open automatically, this goes for fridges too, but doesn’t work for gates.

Ammo is scarce, don’t waste it. Go for headshots and don’t aim for legs unless your goal is to stumble them. Headshots save ammo and time. And don’t waste heavy ammo with AK’s and rifles unless you’re in two-handed mode.

Take on tougher guys and then mop up the rest later. When you see a group of zombies in an area, target the guys that have shoulder pads and helmets. It makes it easier in the long run.

In horde mode, bring a friend. Enemies come from all angles, so you’ll need a guy watching your back.
Same goes for campaign. If you lack friends, just join public matches.

Pick your weapons wisely. If you see a pistol and you already have two, just don’t. It takes up space. If you see heavy weapons, don’t take it unless you have a lot of heavy ammo on hand.

Always duel wield. It doesn’t matter it you have heavy weapons, just do it anyway. I especially recommend dual wielding revolvers, since there strong and don’t waste ammo.

Don’t even try to stealth around. Killing zombies is unavoidable. If you want more stealth-incorporated games, try phantom ops or boneworks. And don’t try to avoid the big horde fights , prepare before hand by grabbing ammo and weapons.

Complaints

In two handed I didn’t like how weak the rifle is. It’s annoying how weak because it takes half your clip to take down ONE zombie. The rifle is like a weaker version of the pistol, except as a rifle. So, devs, when you get the chance, upgrade the rifle.

The thing where you have to eject the clip first and then reload is annoying. If you’re gonna do it that way, make it more realistic, there should be a mode on different reloading ways.

I kind of hope that the devs make it so you can access checkpoints within levels in multiplayer so you don’t have to play through the level all over again. I play in multiplayer a lot, and having to start over a level all over again is pretty annoying.

40 bucks feels not really worth it. If the dlcs were included, that’s 40 bucks.

Suggestions

A manual reloading mod would be nice, I love game with those, and they come in short supply. It’s also up the difficulty since you don’t just place it at your hip.

A mount on a gun for the flashlight would be nice, so we could dual wield in dark areas.

A mode to turn off narration would be nice, since gets annoying and stupid and mainly unnecessary. It also kills immersion, since I want to be the hero, not someone else.

That’s all I have. Enjoy the tips, guys, read the complaints devs.
